alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 10 at 11:37PM MST until August 11 at 3:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... The Flood Watch is now in effect for * Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California, and Nevada, including the following areas, in northwest Arizona, Northwest Deserts and Northwest Plateau. In southeast California, Eastern Mojave Desert. In Nevada, Lincoln County, Sheep Range, Southern Clark County, and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHAT...Slow moving thunderstorms forming in the mountainous terrain may produce heavy downpours and flash flooding. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of washes and other low-lying and flood-prone locations.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
